casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Percy SMITH. No. 610P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 14, 2006. Kathleen U. Baldwin, Assistant Attorney General, C. Colon Willoughby, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th day of November 2006 by Defendant to Strike Felony Sentencing:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 14th day of December 2006."
